moves.1. e4:
Getting The Revenge In First.

Most of my games drag on into the 50s and 60s if not beyond as I'm a material player rather than an inspirational player. Just occasionally though things work out beautifully.... though my opponent may disagree.
moves.1... e5 2. Nf3 d6 3. Bc4: I'm not convinced about d6 as a reply, I just carry on as normal since it helps my development and curtails the f8 bishop for me.
moves.6... Bf6 7. Qd3 Ne7 8. Bg5 Bxg5 9. Nxg5: f7 pawn looking vulnerable and white dev far superior.
moves.9... O-O 10. e5: Deliberate move, fairly ambitious but nowt tried, nowt gained.
moves.10... d5 11. Qxh7#: *grins* And thats why I don't like the book suggestion about castling as early as possible. If I can I like to keep it as an option until midgame.
